job_purpose: To shape the eCommerce platform of a fast-growing children's clothing business, creating a seamless and engaging shopping experience for customers.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop, maintain, and optimize the website with a focus on UX, speed, and conversion
Build engaging front-end interfaces and scalable back-end systems
Implement and manage products, inventory, filters, and merchandising features
Create an intuitive shopping journey from landing page to post-purchase
Collaborate with design, marketing, and customer experience teams to translate business needs into technical solutions
Integrate and manage eCommerce platforms like WooCommerce
Oversee integration with payment gateways for secure transactions
Analyze site performance, user behavior, and checkout flows for improvements
Possibly contribute to mobile app development or API integrations
required_qualifications: Proven experience in full-stack development with a focus on eCommerce websites
Strong front-end skills: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (React, Vue, or similar)
Solid back-end knowledge: PHP, Node.js, Python, or similar
Understanding of customer journey design, sales funnels, and conversion optimization
Experience with payment gateways, secure checkout flows, and cart recovery strategies
Familiarity with eCommerce analytics tools like Google Analytics, SEM Rush, Hotjar, or similar
Comfort with CMS platforms and integrations
Proactive, collaborative mindset with a problem-solving attitude
preferred_qualifications: Experience with mobile app development or app store integration
company_details: A fast-growing children's clothing business dedicated to making shopping for children's wear fun, easy, and beautifully simple. The company values creativity, high-energy, innovation, and a supportive culture that fosters initiative.
